Reviews.Title: Very good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Phil
Reviews.Content: A very good phone for this price.These are what i found out... and not sure if these will be the points you would consider to choose a phonePros :1. Good user interface.Its fast and easy2. Supports Wifi and 3G3. Has touch key pad (not physical) in both landscape and potrait mode.4. Supports java applications/games5. Good camera6. For that price ,you wont find a lot of phones giving these features.7. Good sound capabilityCon :1. LG has a app store, but this phone is conisdered as a non us phone. So people who buy it in US will not be able to make use of online LG app store. (This phone works perfectly fine whether you are US or not- its just the online site which we cant take advantage of)2. Camera tough impressive in day light ,not really good for dim light, inspite of 8 MP and flash.3. GPS is assisted GPS ,so you need wifi or 3g to use its GPS properly.Its a good phone if you dont want to spent a lot of money on iphone.All we need basically is available in this phone like Internet,music,photo etc etc.It a good valu for money and happy with this. one more thing its sleek and cool from style perspective.

Reviews.Content: Big disappointment - its very sluggish and slow, making and receiving calls is really awkward and to top it off it's not compatible with Vista - avoid.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, lousy user guide, dissappointed price guarantee policy
Reviews.Author: hcarvajal
Reviews.Content: I bought this LG GC900 Viewty Smart phone over 1 month ago. The phone functionality is working fine, from previous phones, this viewty is quite nice, intelligent and the touch screen features makes and made my life a lot easier.  I am disappointed with LG's User Guide, still missing instructions in how to do things, but the worst part is that I called LG to get more details on the usage and did not receive any support because this LG GC900 is an international phone.  LG convenience with limited commitment to the customer is to sell this phone in the U.S., receives US dollars, but as far as support you are on your own.  LG really sucks.My second disappointment was with the reseller N1 Wireless, at first the price was excellent and unbeatable, 2 days after ordering my phone, the price was reduced by $25.00.  I called to receive the discounted price based on their price guarantee policy, but I was told that I would not  received the $25.00, but only $5.00 discount.  No reasons, even after I read their own price guarantee policy.  My phone had not left their warehouse, but it didn't matter.  So the bottom line is a nice phone, no support from LG and a reseller who does not guarantee their own price policy.  This reseller was recommended by Amazon.com

Reviews.Title: GOOD CAMERA, REGULAR SMARTPHONE
Reviews.Author: Humberto
Reviews.Content: I expected more of this product. I have a serious problem with my phone, when i receiving a call at night or i'm in place with artificial lighting the touch screen doesn't work. Is not GPS,it's  A-GPS, the camera it's very good. The OS it's very friendly but it's very very slow. Navigate the www in this phone it's regular. typical message. Not enough memory. including when you clean the cache and others. Headphones sucks. The screen have amazing colors. I call to LG service  with the intention to solve my problems and i can't find i solution. The first and last time that i buy a phone LG.The Organizer it's regular. When receive a call, in many occasions  don't recognize your contacts. the same thing when you receive messages (only appears the number, oh how it is?). I'm waiting for official updates and nothing. :(

Reviews.Title: Quadband phone
Reviews.Author: janine
Reviews.Content: I got this  cell 2 weeks ago and I am not happy. It is light  has nice features but internet is extremely slow, touch screen often does not react, not intuitive to navigate, was produced in the beginning  of 2009. Calls drop or cannot be heard properly sometimes, I use it with T-mobile. I hope it works better in  Europe than in the US.

Reviews.Title: I recommend
Reviews.Author: AleB
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a touchscreen cellphone, and this was exactly what I needed. For the price it is a good product.I really recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Fernando A. Pinto
Reviews.Content: Some features are comparable with other and rate better in most of the aspects. Camera is amazing with the resolution.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 900/2100 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities.
8 megapixel autofocus camera; Schneider-Kreuznach optics; LED flash; manual focus; geotagging; image stabilization; multi face detection (up to 3); smile detection; D1 (720x480 pixels)@30fps; VGA@30fps; QVGA time-lapse and slow-mo video recording.
3-Inch 16M-color capacitive TFT touchscreen of WVGA resolution (480 x 800 pixels); Wi-Fi and GPS receiver with A-GPS; 1.5GB flash storage; microSD card slot (up to 32GB); Dolby Mobile for Music.
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 330 hours of standby time
